abstract: Pennsylvania Supreme Court issues temporary block preventing District Atty Risa Vetri Ferman from bringing charges against state Atty Gen Kathleen G Kane; grand jury had accused Kane of perjury and other charges in case that involved disclosures about secret investigation to the Philadelphia Daily News.
lead_paragraph: A county prosecutor was temporarily stopped from filing charges against State Attorney General Kathleen Kane, who has been accused of perjury for disclosing an investigation to a newspaper.
snippet: A county prosecutor was temporarily stopped from filing charges against State Attorney General Kathleen Kane, who has been accused of perjury for disclosing an investigation to a newspaper.

keywords.value: National Assn for the Advancement of Colored People
keywords.name: organizations

headline.main: Pennsylvania Court Blocks Charges Against Attorney General
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania Court Blocks Charges Against Official
